row.process:
:SET &command# = 'java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm ArchiveEntity -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ' :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ')
:IF &UC4RB_RM_NAME# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-n "&UC4RB_RM_NAME#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_RM_FOLDER# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-f "&UC4RB_RM_FOLDER#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_RM_OWNER# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-o "&UC4RB_RM_OWNER#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_RM_MAIN_TYPE# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-t "&UC4RB_RM_MAIN_TYPE#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_RM_CUSTOM_TYPE# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-c "&UC4RB_RM_CUSTOM_TYPE#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_RM_START# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-s "&UC4RB_RM_START#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_RM_END# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-e "&UC4RB_RM_END#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_RM_CONDITIONS# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-co "&UC4RB_RM_CONDITIONS#" ') :ENDIF &command#
